activity: Ice Cream Tasting at Hafen Münster
description: Enjoy a quick ice cream tasting session at one of Münster’s best gelato spots by the harbor.

locationInfo.description: A lively harbor area with scenic views and excellent ice cream parlors.
safetyTips: Try lighter flavors for a refreshing experience.
Find a shaded seating area to enjoy your ice cream.

description: Take a short stroll around the historical Prinzipalmarkt and cool off near the fountains.

locationInfo.description: A charming old town street lined with medieval buildings and refreshing water fountains.
safetyTips: Wear light clothing to stay cool.
Carry a small hand towel to wipe off sweat.
Avoid walking in direct sunlight for too long.

activity: Cold Drink Break at Aasee Terrace
description: Relax at the Aasee terrace with a cold drink and enjoy the waterfront view.
groupSuitability: Perfect for a quick refreshment break

locationInfo.description: A scenic lakeside promenade with cafes and outdoor seating.
safetyTips: Drink plenty of water alongside your cold beverage.
Apply sunscreen if sitting in an open-air area.

activity: Cooling Mist Experience at LWL Museum Garden
description: Step into the mist cooling installation at the LWL Museum garden for a quick refreshment.
groupSuitability: Great for two people escaping the heat

locationInfo.description: A beautifully designed garden with interactive mist cooling installations.
safetyTips: Avoid standing too long in direct sunlight.
Use a hat or umbrella for extra shade.

activity: Mini Workout at Schlossplatz Outdoor Gym
description: Do a quick stretching or bodyweight workout at the open-air gym at Schlossplatz.

locationInfo.description: A modern outdoor fitness area with workout stations near Schloss Münster.
